title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: CPU+GPU inference server and CLI for Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. with one-line model pulls.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers via the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with synchronous & async APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, fluent builder, Android compatible, Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with colourful chat REPL and model management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models with built-in retries.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that talks to local Ollama; includes session memory and model selector.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with RxJS streams for chat & generate endpoints.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama; strongly-typed models, dependency-injection friendly, supports streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components for pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) and compose examples for running Ollama server in Docker.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and persistent storage.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain; ingest PDFs and query via CLI or REST.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses in chat rooms with slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for Ollama; cross-platform native wrapper with tray icon and chat UI.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async client for Ollama REST API with serde models and streaming.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, copy, delete with context support.
